description:
Sanpei`s Froakie evolved into Sanpei`s Frogadier sometime after it left Ninja Village on its journey and the first encounter with Ash and his friends. Nihei specifically noted that Sanpei`s Froakie had evolved into Sanpei`s Greninja to which Sanpei said that it had become quite potent. Sanpei`s Froakie was seen in a picture in Sanpei`s room in the Ninja Village.
None of Sanpei`s Froakie`s original moves can be confirmed.
name: Keromatsu (Sanpei)
